DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of oral administration of probiotic Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG in middle ear and adenoid tonsil.
DOC.brief_title: Lactobacillus Rhamnosus GG in the Middle Ear and Adenoid Tonsil
